<rule id="quarkus-kubernetes-client-00010" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <dependency artifactId="kubernetes-client" groupId="io.fabric8"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'kubernetes-client' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-kubernetes-client' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the `io.fabric8:kubernetes-client` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-kubernetes-client`  
                        Further information in the link below.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/kubernetes-client" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
